name: Game of Life
description: Conway's Game of Life-based game written in C++ using SFML library

name: RGL
description: C game framework with Input, Sound, Rendering, Texture Loading, and Animation built-in.

name: Pjgen
description: Project generator for multiple languages (e.g. C, C++, Web(HTML,CSS,JS), Python)

name: Canvastein
description: Raycaster prototype written in Typescript inspired by Wolfenstein3D. The prototype has a WebGL renderer and a Canvas2D renderer.

name: RottLike
description: Client-Server multiplayer game-prototype written in C++ using SFML. The prototype has a chat system and synchronized player movement/interactions.

name: Switchracer
description: Typing game written in Typescript highly inspired by MonkeyType
